data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Jeonbuk needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
In the minute 16, Jeonbuk are pushing forward but Han Kyo-won's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 18, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Seongnam.
Hyung-Jin Ko blows against Jeonbuk's Jo Gue-sung for offside.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
At Tancheon Sports Complex, Kim Hyeon-seong has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Goal! Seongnam have got their heads in front thanks to a Yu In-soo strike.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Yeon Je-un for Seongnam is back on the field again.
In the minute 33, Yeon Je-un is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Kim Hyeon-seong for Seongnam gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 40, Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Tancheon Sports Complex.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Gustavo is on a sub for Jo Gue-sung for Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Seongnam.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Goal! Park Tae-jun extends Seongnam's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Yu In-soo to set up the goal.
Kim Bo-kyung of Jeonbuk smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Seongnam drives forward and Yeon Je-un gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jose Morais (Jeonbuk) is making a first substitution, with Modou Barrow replacing Kim Bo-kyung.
In the minute 57, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Seongnam's area.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
Kim Dong-hyeon (Seongnam) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 58, Jeonbuk's Choi Bo-kyung has been booked in Seongnam.
In the minute 59, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Gustavo for Jeonbuk has been booked by Hyung-Jin Ko and receives a first yellow card.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 61, Jeonbuk make their second substitution with Murilo replacing Lee Ju-yong.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Lee Seung-ki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Jeonbuk.
In the minute 68, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Seongnam throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Lee Seung-ki is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 69, Red card in Seongnam! Kim Hyeon-seong has been shown a second yellow card by Hyung-Jin Ko.
Jeonbuk's Lee Seung-ki is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 76, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Seongnam throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yeon Je-un (Seongnam) has received a yellow card from Hyung-Jin Ko.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Choi Cheol-sun is booked for the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Na Sangho for Seongnam who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Na Sangho is back on his feet again.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Seongnam.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lee Jae-won (Seongnam) has replaced the possibly injured Na Sangho at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for Jeonbuk!
Jeonbuk's Murilo breaks free at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 88, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Ahn Yeong-kyu is replacing Park Tae-jun for the home team.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Jeonbuk are coming forward and Choi Cheol-sun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Hyung-Jin Ko blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
